name: HardwoodHelper
0:
”'Alexa, Ask Hardwood Helper for a fact"”
”'Tell me something about basketball'”
”'Give me a statistic'”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hardwood helper
des: Hardwood Helper is an Alexa skill which serves to bring you interesting basketball statistics. Ask Alexa to open HH and tell you something interesting, and you'll receive a little factoid or tidbit of information that's hopefully insightful and enlightening. For both casual and avid basketball fans alike, Hardwood Helper is here for you.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
